conclusion: Need to find the output power and total power of the power source when the circuit is formed with the light bulb.
The intersection point of the straight line and the curve on the U-I graph is at U = 2 V and I = 2 A.
The intersection point indicates the operating point of the circuit.
Calculate output power using P_output = U x I, resulting in P_output = 4 W.
The y-intercept of the straight line is at 3 V, indicating the emf.
Calculate total power using P_total = emf x I, resulting in P_total = 6 W.
The output power of the power source is 4 W and the total power is 6 W.
